name: Forwarder
description: Contract that will forward any incoming Ether to the creator of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: flush
functionDecorators.description: It is possible that funds were sent to this address before the contract was deployed. We can flush those funds to the parent address.

functionDecorators.name: flushTokens
functionDecorators.description: Execute a token transfer of the full balance from the forwarder token to the parent address.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenContractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the erc20 token contract.
